name: Suika Is Drunk
description:
Oh no! The sake is too strong! But ONI are stronger!

  • Note from the team: We worked hard on the game but it's just 3 days, we hope you can enjoy what we could put in, it's a prototype
  • Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys to move and left mouse click/z key to punch. The idea was to combo punch to the music, but it could not be implemented in time.

Submitted to Touhou Game Jam 6 (4-Feb <-> 7-Feb 2021)
